property.name: DBS_Game_Form_Text_1_a
property.default: , you took the MindCrowd online memory quiz to advance our Alzheimer's research.
property.label: DBS_Game_Form_Text_1_a

property.name: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_2
property.default: Your test results were intriguing, and you have been selected to join us for Phase 2. You'll need to complete an online consent form, prick your finger, and donate blood drops. We'll send a postage-paid, blood-drop collection kit right to your home to make it as easy as possible to participate. You'll be advancing science, just by pricking your finger. Cool, right?
property.label: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_2

property.name: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_3
property.default: Click on the button below to learn more about Phase 2.
property.label: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_3

property.name: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_4
property.default: Yes, I want to learn more about phase 2!
property.label: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_4

property.name: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_5
property.default: Thank you again for your willingness to help advance our understanding of the brain!
property.label: DBS_Bean_Game_Form_Text_5
